h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Final Bell
content: Otherwise, return to the marsh and head through the structure the Whiteclad Noble was guarding to leave the Bamboo Grove behind and enter the final area of the Black Wind Mountain - **Black Wind Cave**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Final Bell'.
The content is as follows:
Otherwise, return to the marsh and head through the structure the Whiteclad Noble was guarding to leave the Bamboo Grove behind and enter the final area of the Black Wind Mountain - **Black Wind Cave**.
